name: Project Rogue (Nick A. Spyrakos)
description:
This upload exists purely for archival purposes.

*Controllers required*

Project Rogue was originally created for SAE Athens in 2018 as part of their Games Programming bachelor course and was my first attempt at a 3D as I started learning Unity and Programming. The game never reached a working state and was submitted as is. Source files don't exist anymore. 

Through this project I learned a lot about UI, composition, co-op systems, third-person controllers and animation. In retrospect, this is simply crude - now I could do much better in a weekend. Still, I like going back once in a while and retracing my steps and exploring my old mistakes.
